Reviews.Title: ZEEMO DIGITAL CAN'T DELIVER
Reviews.Author: Greg Ratajczak
Reviews.Content: ZEEMO DIGITAL sent me the wrong camera case and never exchanged it.  Terrible!!!!! The case was the main reason I purchased the bundle.  After countless correspondence, ZEEMO DIGITAL couldn't make the situation right.Greg Ratajczak

ProductInfo.Features:
12.2MP APS-C CMOS Sensor, Body Only
SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card Slot, DIGIC 4 Imaging Processor
2.7" Clear View LCD, 720p HD Movie Mode
100-6400 ISO, Compatible with Canon EF and EF-S Lenses
63 Zone Dual-Layer System / 9 Point AF, 3 fps Continuous Shooting
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital Slr Camera (Body) + 32gb Camera Accessory Kit
